hero.title: Tools for reflection at your own pace
intro: Curated bilingual resources to support your experiments between sessions.
No email gate, no pressure—just invitations to pause and notice. You can also explore a set of guided self-reflection tools designed to support your thinking between sessions.

sections.title: Featured tools
sections.lead: Each resource is grounded in ICF-aligned coaching principles and designed to be adapted to your reality.

tools.title: Values Map
summary: Map what truly matters to you and check how your current choices align with your core values.

tools.title: Self-talk Reframe Cards
summary: Gentle prompts to help you notice harsh self-talk and reframe it with more compassionate language.

tools.title: Behaviour Experiment Ladder
summary: Plan small, low-risk experiments to test new behaviours instead of all-or-nothing change.

tools.title: Choice Clarifier
summary: Lay out your options, costs, and needs so decisions feel less foggy and more grounded.

tools.title: Thought Log
summary: Capture triggering situations, thoughts, and feelings to spot patterns over time.

tools.title: Role Separation Practice
summary: Gently separate 'me as a person' from 'me in this role' so criticism doesn’t feel like an attack on your whole identity.

tools.title: Emotion Triangle
summary: Notice the link between situations, feelings, and actions, and gently explore other options.

sections.title: Use with care
body: These tools complement coaching conversations; they do not replace therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice. Adapt them kindly and pause if something feels overwhelming.
You choose what to complete and what to skip—there is no homework requirement.
Respect confidentiality when working with others and only share what you have consent to share.
If strong emotions surface, reach out to trusted support or professional services in your region.

sections.title: Want a guided walkthrough?
body: Book a 20-minute chat to explore how these tools can support your goals, or ask for a custom resource for your team.
